description:
What is S-mobiili?


S-mobiili combines retail, banking and asset management services into one app.

You can activate the app with any bank’s credentials or a mobile certificate.

For more information about using or activating S-mobiili, tap the bubble in the top right corner of the app or go to https://www.s-kanava.fi/palvelut/s-mobiili/.



What can I do in S-mobiili?


Member services

- Bonus and Purchases – Track the bonus status of your household and check how close you are to the next bonus level. Review the breakdown of your purchases into different product groups, the degree of Finnish origin of your shopping basket, and compare price levels with competitors.
- S-Etukortti and S-Etukortti barcode – Earn bonus and take advantage of co-op member benefits by adding your S-Etukortti to Apple Wallet or with S-Etukortti barcode.
- Benefits and tips – Benefits tailored to you and current news. Note: By enabling notifications, you can make sure you’re always informed about your latest benefits.
- Receipts for your purchases – Receipts for your purchases will be stored in the electronic receipt archive and you can stop receiving unnecessary paper receipts.
- Your favourite outlets – Easily find benefits, promotions, opening hours and services for your favourite outlets in one place.
- Where to earn bonus – Search or browse locations in your area where you can earn bonus
- My information and information of your co-op member household – Easily manage your contact information and the information of your co-op member household


Bank services

- Authentication – Log in and pay with your personal PIN code or fingerprint instead of using banking credentials – also works for online stores and public services!
- Saver – Achieve easy savings as part of your everyday spending. Save one euro for every card payment or transfer the bonuses you get for your S Group purchases to a fund.
- Investments – Check your funds or investments, make additional investments in the funds you own, or invest in new funds.
- Loans – Apply for an S-Laina loan or increase the loan amount, and check your loan information.
- Accounts – View your account balances and transactions.
- E-salary – View electronic payslips.
- Cards – Apply for a new card or increase your card’s credit limit. Check the PIN code of your card, adjust security limits, and view your credit transactions.
- Apple Pay – Add your payment cards to Apple Wallet and start making mobile payments.
- Click to Pay – Connect your payment card to the Click to Pay service, which makes it easier and more secure for you to pay online.
- Paying – Pay bills or transfer money between your accounts easily and quickly.
- E-invoices - Order new e-invoices and view your existing e-invoice orders.
- S-Bank Private – Make use of investment and asset management services tailored to your needs. Only available to S-Bank Private customers.
- Contact us – Call us or send us a message, provide feedback on our services, or view our FAQs.

You can use S-mobiili on a device with a iOS 15 or newer.

After activating S-mobiili, you can change the language to English (Beta) in the Me section of the app.

Please note that in order to use S-mobiili, you must be a co-op member or belong to a co-op member household. More information about co-op membership: s-kanava.fi



What does S-mobiili request permission to?


Location data, so that we can provide you with the closest services and the most relevant benefits.

Use of the camera, to scan barcodes so you can conveniently pay your bills.

Sending notifications, so that you can be notified of matters like received e-invoices and electronic cash receipts.

MobilePaylla maksaminen on helpon helppoa!

MobilePayn avulla voit:
• lähettää ja pyytää rahaa
• vastaanottaa rahaa
• lähettää rahalahjoja
• maksaa verkkokaupoissa, sovelluksissa tai myymälöissä
• maksaa toistuvia maksuja kuten lehtitilauksia
• jakaa kuluja kavereiden kanssa
• kerätä yhteistä kassaa vaikkapa koulun luokkaretkeä tai lomamatkaa varten

Käyttääksesi MobilePayta, sinun tulee olla yli 15-vuotias ja tarvitset suomalaisen henkilötunnuksen, pankkitilin, puhelinnumeron sekä pankkikortin.

MobilePay on saatavilla suomeksi, ruotsiksi, englanniksi, norjaksi sekä tanskaksi.

Helpon helppoa!

Join the 60+ million customers worldwide who use our app to spend, send, and save smarter.

This description is relevant for UK residents only.

Make your spend, well-spent

- Pay any way, with physical cards, virtual cards, single-use virtual cards for extra protection, Google or Apple Pay — you name it
- Spend abroad like a local with great exchange rates (fees additional to the rate provided may apply)
- Easily track and analyse your spending
- Link your external bank accounts to Revolut to stay on top of all your spending in one place
- Design a physical card you vibe with (fees may apply). Want to add a little luxury? Upgrade to Metal for a shiny steel card
- Not enough? Level up to Ultra to bag an exclusive platinum-plated card (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply)
- Set your kids up for financial success. Get them a free Revolut ＜18 account, with their own card, so they can learn about money in a safe and fun way

Send money near, far, wherever they are

- Request or send 30+ currencies with a tap to anyone, anywhere
- Chat, send, and receive money, in one place. Whatever your plans, transfers are instant between your Revolut friends
- No more awkward money chats! Split, chat, and settle bills in one place. You can even share a fun GIF to diffuse any tension

Save the interest-ing way

- Grow your money in GBP, EUR, and USD, with annual interest paid daily, directly into your account
- Access your savings whenever you need to, with zero penalties or fees
- Build your savings effortlessly — set up recurring transfers and round up spare change to stash cash without even trying

Explore investments (Capital at risk. Content is for UK residents only)

- Start investing from $1 (other fees may apply)
- Choose from 2,000+ stocks to invest in some of the world's most popular companies
- Enjoy commission-free stock trading within your monthly allowance (other fees may apply)
- Access our trading Learn courses and quizzes

Investment services are provided by Revolut Trading Ltd (No. 11567840) which is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FRN: 933846). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.
End the overspend

- Get instant spending notifications to keep track of every payment
- Use smart budgeting and analytics tools to stop wondering where your money went, and start telling it where to go
- Worried about missing upcoming payments or subscription charges? Don’t be — we’ll notify you beforehand

Looking to go even further? Upgrade to one of our paid plans to get exclusive cards, more benefits, even cooler perks, you name it. Pick the plan that’s right for you: Plus, Premium, Metal or Ultra (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply).

Unlock security features that you control

- Freeze and unfreeze your card in a tap
- Use single-use cards with details that regenerate each time, for an extra layer of protection
- Set spending limits and get notifications to keep track of your money

How we protect your money

- Your savings are protected by the FSCS through our partner banks – up to £85k. Subject to eligibility, visit the FSCS website for more information
- Our sophisticated fraud prevention system flags high-risk transactions and pings you an alert, so you can spot scams and nip ‘em in the bud
- It’s our business to protect your data, and we take it seriously. Extensive identity verification keeps sign-ups secure, and your account is protected with passcodes and biometrics
- We’re available 24/7 via our in-app customer support

Revolut Ltd (No. 08804411) is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (FRN: 900562). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.

LähiTapiola Vakuutukset on vakuutusyhtiö LähiTapiolan sovellus, jossa asioit helposti mobiililaitteellasi.
Tarkastele vakuutuksia, ilmoita vahingoista, maksa laskuja ja ota yhteyttä – vaikka kotisohvalta. LähiTapiola-sovelluksen avulla taskussasi on aina luotettava yhteys vakuutusyhtiöösi.

Sovelluksessa voit:
•  Tarkastella ja hallita vakuutuksia: Autovakuutus, kotivakuutus vai terveysvakuutus? Näe vakuutustietosi yhdessä paikassa ja päivitä niitä helposti
•  Saada apua hätätilanteissa: Jos auto jättää tien varteen tai matkalla tapahtuu, voit soittaa Hätäpalveluumme 24/7
•  Toimia vahingon sattuessa: Tee vahinkoilmoitus vaihe vaiheelta ja seuraa sen käsittelyä
•  Tehdä hakemuksia: Hae korvausta tai suoralaskutuslupaa
•  Maksaa laskut kätevästi: Tarkastele laskujasi, ota käyttöön paperiton palvelu tai e-lasku ja vältä eräpäivien unohtuminen
•  Olla yhteydessä helposti: Lähetä viestejä, löydä asiakaspalvelun yhteystiedot tai varaa aika
•  Löytää tarjouksia ja tietoa: Hyödynnä vaihtuvat edut ja uusimmat artikkelit taloutesi tueksi

Ladatessasi LähiTapiola Vakuutukset-sovelluksen tarvitset tunnistautumista varten verkkopankkitunnuksesi. Jatkossa sovellus toimii halutessasi kätevästi Face-ID-kasvojentunnistuksella.

Kehitämme sovellusta jatkuvasti ja palautteesi on meille tärkeää. Arvostele sovellus ja auta meitä luomaan sinulle entistä sujuvampia kokemuksia!

Med Walley-appen får du full koll på dina betalningar. Se vad som är betalt, vad som återstår och när det är dags för nästa. Vill du flytta fram ett betaldatum eller dela upp ett köp i mindre, mer hanterbara delar? Inga problem! Det gör du snabbt och smidigt direkt i appen, som dessutom är helt kostnadsfri att ladda ner och använda. 

Det här kan du göra i Walley-appen: 

Få full översikt över alla dina betalningar. 

Flytta fram betaltiden direkt i appen. 

Dela upp betalningen och betala i mindre delar. 

Få notiser så att du aldrig missar en betalning. 

Betala smidigt och snabbt med bara några klick. 

Pausa en faktura vid retur, så slipper du betala i onödan. 

Om Walley 

Walley är en betallösning som används av 1000-tals e-handlare och butiker i Norden för att skapa köpupplevelser som känns smidiga och självklara. När du har hittat den där sällsynta vinylsamlingen, de robusta vandringskängorna eller den hypermoderna stektermometern, ska det vara enkelt att slå till. Därför har vi samlat alla betalsätt du kan tänkas behöva för att köpet ska bli så tryggt, flexibelt och krångelfritt som möjligt. 

För när allt flyter på, och du kan betala på det sätt som passar dig och din plånbok bäst, kan det nästan kännas lite magiskt. Och det är precis så det ska vara.

Fleur is a cute and simple budget planner and tracker app. The app allows you to easily add daily expenses and income. You can also set a monthly budget, create multiple accounts and track your debt. Fleur is an all in one app that will help you manage your money.

Key Features:
- Minimal, elegant, and aesthetically pleasing design
- Easily log expenses and income
- Set a monthly budget
- View insights and understand spending habits
- View transaction history
- Add repeating transactions
- Create new categories
- iCloud sync
- No sign in required
- Easy search and filter

Read more about our Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy here:
https://fleurbudget.com/privacy_terms.html

We are always there for you!
- If you are facing any issues or have questions, please feel free to email us. Hope you enjoy using our app as much as we do! :)

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

PayPal UK Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) as an electronic money institution (firm reference number 994790); in relation to its regulated consumer credit activities (firm reference number 996405); and for the provision of cryptocurrency services (firm reference number 1000741). Some products and services, such as PayPal Pay in 3 and PayPal Working Capital, are not regulated by the FCA and may offer a lower level of protection. Please read product terms for further details. PayPal UK Ltd's company number is 14741686. Its registered office is 5 Fleet Place, London, United Kingdom, EC4M 7RD

Nordnet's products and services are available in Denmark, Finland, Norway and Sweden. With Nordnet's award-winning app, investing in stocks, funds, and ETFs is easier than ever. In the app you can track your progress and what is happening on the stock market. It's completely free to download and use the app.

• We offer trading in stocks, funds, and other securities at low fees on several of the world's largest exchanges.

• Discover new investments through top and theme lists, articles, and current campaigns.

• See discussions about investing and specific stocks and funds from our users.

• Follow your holdings and the stock market's development in real-time.



GET STARTED IN THREE MINUTES.

Create an account directly in the app. Deposit your money easily and secure to start trading and investing.



LOW FEES FOR TRADING AND INVESTING.

Always low fees regardless of how little or much you trade. Choose the commission class that fits your trading.



AUTOMATIC MONTHLY INVESTING.

Save automatically each month in funds. Get help choosing a fund plan that suits you.



WIDE RANGE OF STOCKS AND FUNDS.

Choose from thousands of stocks and funds on multiple exchanges around the world. Get inspired by other investors' stock holdings or choose funds based on your savings goals: sustainable, low fees, or highest returns.



REAL-TIME PRICE ALERTS.

Get a push notification when your watched stocks and other securities reach the level you have set.



WATCHLISTS.

Find your next investment through our watchlists. Choose industries that interest you and then get lists of instruments within those themes. Use it as inspiration to find new investments or to keep an eye on exciting companies. You can also create your own watchlists.



LISTEN AND READ REPORTS WITH QUARTR.

In partnership with Quartr, you can easily keep track of your favorite stocks by listening to company presentations during quarterly and annual reports. You can also download reports and presentations in text format.



INTERACTIVE GRAPHS.

Compare your investments with relevant indexes and see how you perform over time. See features for more advanced investors, such as trading volume and candlesticks.



SAFE AND EASY.

Log in with Touch-ID or Face-ID. Hide your balance if you, for example, want to log in in public environments.



ABOUT NORDNET.

We are a leading Nordic digital broker for savings and investments with over 2 million customers in Sweden, Finland, Norway, and Denmark.



Through innovation, simplicity, and transparency, we challenge traditional structures and give private savers access to the same information, tools, and services as professional investors. Welcome to Nordnet.

OP-mobile is an easy and secure app for managing your main banking and insurance, wherever you are. You can also have your company’s banking services at hand. You can use Mobile key to identify yourself for OP's digital services and public services, and confirm payments for online purchases.

In Resurs app we have gathered everything that you as customer might need. Get a full overview of your various accounts, handle your payments and utilize different campaigns and discounts. In our app you can also manage the settings for your card, e.g., activate or de-activate contactless payments or internet purchases and change your PIN-code. If questions arise along the way, you can chat with our customer support inside the app. Everything gathered, in one safe place.

The app in short:

* You get a full overview of your accounts
* You can keep track of your balances
* Fast and simple payments
* Pay things your way
* Manage your card settings
* Access to rapid and professional service, chat with our customer support

We are constantly working to improve the app and your experience. This version contains more improvements and fewer bugs. Update to get the most out of your Resurs app!

Bank in your pocket 

The app puts the entire bank in the palm of your hand, enabling you to do most of your banking swiftly, smoothly and securely.   

You can test the demo version of the app without logging in. You can access it through Menu before logging in. All information in the demo version is fictitious.  

Examples of what you can do in the app:  

YOUR OVERVIEW  
In the Overview tab, you can view and manage all your finances in one place. You can add, hide or rearrange the order of your content to personalise your experience. Quick actions take you straight to several functions, such as Search, helping you find what you need. If you have other banks, you can also add them to get a better overview of your finances.   

PAYMENTS AND TRANSFERS  
Pay your bills and transfer money, both between your own accounts or to a friend. Here, you can also add and manage both e-invoices and direct debits, simplifying your everyday life.  

MANAGE YOUR CARDS  
Connect cards and wearables to Apple Pay for contactless payments. If you forgot your PIN-code, you can view it here. You can also block your card if needed, and we’ll send you a new one automatically. Choose the geographic areas where your credit card can be used and by restricting use for online shopping so you can feel safer and better control of your payments.   

SAVINGS AND INVESTMENTS  
It’s easy to keep track of your savings and see how they are performing. Start saving monthly, trade in funds and stocks, or set a goal for your savings. Get suggestions and ideas for new investments through Find Investments. 

DISCOVER NEW PRODUCTS AND SERVICES  
In the Services tab, you can open different accounts, apply for credit cards or loans, get digital advice for long-term savings, and much more.  

GET BETTER CONTROL OF YOUR FINANCES  
The Insights tab gives you a clear overview of your income and expenditure. Your spending is divided into categories to give you a deeper understanding where your money is going. Here, you can make your own budgets to make it easier to plan and keep track of your expenditure.  

WE'RE HERE FOR YOU   
The Help tab contains all the information you need to get help with your banking. Use the Search function, see frequently asked questions and answers, or chat with us directly. If you call us through the app, you’ve already identified yourself, so we can help you faster.  

We want to know what you think, so feel free to leave a review or send your feedback directly in the app. For more information, you’re welcome to contact us on 0200 70 000 (local rates apply) or visit nordea.fi/mobilebank.  

Download the app today and get access to all the functions that simplify your banking!

Betala enkelt – och få mer på köpet med Qliro
Upplev en app som gör dina betalningar snabbare och smidigare än någonsin. Betala dina fakturor med full kontroll, oavsett om du vill betala allt direkt eller i din egen takt. Och om något går fel? Pausa fakturan med ett klick och hantera returen utan stress.
Men Qliro är mer än bara betalningar. När dina fakturor är betalda, hjälper vi dig att få ut mer av dina pengar. Våra sparkonton erbjuder konkurrenskraftig ränta och flexibilitet, så att du kan spara på dina villkor. Från små sparbelopp till större summor, låt dina pengar växa med Qliro.

Varför välja Qliro?
• Snabba och säkra betalningar: Logga in med BankID och betala tryggt varje gång.
• Enkel hantering av returer: Pausa fakturan, skicka tillbaka varan och vänta – vi sköter resten.
• Samlingsfaktura: Samla alla dina köp på en faktura och betala på det sätt som passar dig bäst.
• Attraktiva sparkonton: Få ränta på allt du sparar, oavsett belopp.

Ladda ner Qliro nu och upplev enkelheten i både betalning och sparande.

Nordea ID app provides an easy and secure way to authenticate your identity.

With the app you can do your banking regardless of time and place. Begin by installing the app on your mobile device and go through the activation process. You shouldn’t rely on just one copy of the Nordea ID app. If your phone or tablet breaks down or gets lost, you will also lose the Nordea ID app and you will need to go through the activation process again. To avoid this, we recommend that you  install the Nordea ID app on more than one mobile device.

With the Nordea ID app you can:
- log in to Nordea services and confirm actions
- confirm online payments in a secure way
- as a personal customer identify yourself in other service providers’ services (only in Finland and Norway)
- identify yourself when calling Nordea Customer Service. (only in Finland and Norway)

The app can’t be used on rooted mobile devices for security reasons.

Read more:
Finland: nordea.fi/IDapp
Norway: nordea.no/NordeaID
Denmark: nordea.dk/NordeaID

Crypto investing made easy and safe with Coinmotion. Join over 180,000 users who trust our secure, Finnish platform to invest in Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other promising cryptocurrencies.

WHY COINMOTION?
• Easiest & safest: Our user-friendly mobile app, BankID authentication, and integrations with Nordic banks ensure a smooth and secure investment experience.
• Trusted by over 180,000 Finnish and Swedish users: We are one of Europe’s cryptocurrency pioneers, having started operations in 2012. We operate under the regulation of the Finnish Financial Supervisory Authority and adhere to the highest security standards.

KEY FEATURES
• Buy Bitcoin & more: Purchase Bitcoin, Ethereum, and 200 other cryptocurrencies using credit/debit cards, instant online banking, or SEPA bank transfers in just minutes.
• Automated savings: Automate monthly investments and grow your crypto portfolio effortlessly.
• Secure storage: Your assets are protected with multi-signature offline cold storage and segregated euro custody accounts.
• Extensive support: Access our dedicated Help Center or call our Customer Support for assistance.

SECURE CRYPTO WALLET
We have been securely storing our clients' funds since 2012. Our clients' crypto funds are secured with multi-sig offline cold storage, and the euro funds are stored on a segregated custody account. Our employees follow the strictest security guidelines, and we recommend you use secure passwords with two-factor authentication.

FINANCIALLY REGULATED
Coinmotion Oy is a registered virtual currency service provider and licensed payment institution regulated by the Finnish Financial Supervisory Authority (Ref: FIVA 36/02.02.00/2018).

SUPPORTED CRYPTOCURRENCIES
Explore and invest in a vast selection of over 200 cryptocurrencies with Coinmotion. Some of our popular offerings include:

Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), XRP (XRP), Stellar (XLM), AAVE (AAVE), Chainlink (LINK), USD Coin (USDC), Uniswap (UNI), Cardano (ADA), Polygon (MATIC), Litecoin (LTC), Shiba Inu (SHIB), Solana (SOL), Dogecoin (DOGE), Avalanche (AVAX), Cosmos (ATOM), Tron (TRX), Polkadot (DOT), Quant (QNT), Algorand (ALGO), Maker (MKR), NEAR Protocol (NEAR), Aptos (APT), Stacks (STX), Sui (SUI).

WEALTH MANAGEMENT
• We reward our most loyal clients with:
• Dedicated Wealth Advisors
• Discounted fees
• Exclusive market insights and reports
• Comprehensive tax and balance reporting
• OTC trading of hundreds of additional tokens

CUSTOMER SUPPORT
If you need help, contact our customer service at info@coinmotion.com or call +358 600 30088. More information at https://helpcenter.coinmotion.com

JOIN US & INVEST WITH CONFIDENCE
Start growing your wealth in crypto today. Download Coinmotion now.

If Mobiilin avulla voit hoitaa vakuutusasiasi helposti missä ja milloin vaan. Sovelluksessa voit tarkastella ja päivittää vakuutusturvaasi, ilmoittaa vahingosta ja seurata sen käsittelyä. Lisäksi näet vakuutuskirjasi ja -laskusi. If Mobiilissa digitaalinen matkavakuutuskortti on aina mukanasi.

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

16 million+ customers send, receive, spend and grow their money internationally with Wise. It’s the fast, simple way to move money in 160 countries and 40 currencies. Products available depend on where you live. Check wise.com or download the app to see what’s available for you.

— International money transfers —
• Send money to 70+ countries, fast
• Get the mid-market exchange rate, like on Google, for every money transfer
• On average, 64% of transfers arrive in under 20 seconds, and 95% arrive within 24 hours
• Secure your transfers with two-factor authentication, encryption and biometrics

— The debit card that’s always got the right currency —
• Spend or withdraw cash in more than 160+ countries
• If you don’t have the local currency, we’ll auto-convert what you have with the lowest possible price
• Freeze and unfreeze your card, and update your digital card details

— Get paid like a local —
• Get your own UK account number and sort code, European IBAN, Australian account details and more, as if you had local bank accounts around the world
• Use these account details to get paid in multiple currencies for free, and for direct debits
• Keep up-to-date with instant push notifications for every transaction

— Hold 40 currencies and convert between them instantly —
• No monthly fee and no maintenance fee to keep money in your account, in most cases
• Convert between currencies instantly, at the real exchange rate, for a super-low fee
• Auto-convert currencies at specific rates, and keep up to date with exchange rates with Rate Alerts

— Put your money to work with Assets —
• Try Interest or Stocks in a few taps. Available in the UK, Singapore and multiple EEA countries, for now
• Capital at risk, growth not guaranteed

— A better business account for going global —
• Pay invoices and bills faster, at a better exchange rate
• Use account details to get paid by clients and customers around the world
• Connect to supported platforms like Amazon, Stripe, Xero, and more

Wise is regulated by local authorities around the world.

In a nutshell, we’re where the world charts, chats and trades markets. Over 100 million people use our social network and supercharged supercharts to make better, brighter decisions when they trade. Download our app to access free charts, alerts, advanced watchlists, plus discuss latest trends with other traders and much, much more. Here’s a fuller feature set: 

World-leading charts
A trader’s rite of passage, charts power insight. Millions use ours – for free – to make better decisions in the markets. Our charts work on any device and outperform many desktop trading platforms. You’ll be able to search for stocks, currencies, cryptos, futures, CFDs and more. A wide range of drawing tools (like Gann Fans and Elliott Waves) and technical indicators will also help you analyze price action.

Simple Pine Script for complex tools
From coding to chart analysis, faster than ever before — we crafted our programming language to give you the power to create custom tools. Pine Script is elegantly minimalist, pre-integrated with data, and breaking your analysis limits.

Bar Replay to hit rewind on past insights 
Watch how pricing data unfolded historically. Rewind markets and review at speed and resolution you desire.

Unmissable alerts 
Trading alerts were never this powerful, flexible, and easy to use. Cloud-based, they are available on any device – get notified by email, app, desktop, or webhook when your alerts trigger.

Made to trade 
Trade directly on our charts – trade through top brokers integrated to our platform, or use Paper Trading to practice buying and selling securities without any of the risk.

One app to track them all
Get a comprehensive view of the financial markets with our app: live quotes, news, trends, financial statements, and fundamentals, all in one place at your fingertips – the fastest way to find all the data you need.

Total economics and corporate reports
Access the latest and upcoming economic events, world companies' earnings, and dividends, in one Calendar.

Watchlist what matters
Keep track of all your beloved stocks and currency pairs with our highly-customizable watchlists. Use them to see real-time price updates and be the first to know what’s moving in the markets – wherever you happen to be. 

Data. Data. Data, 
Gain access to real-time market data from exchanges in the US, Europe and Asia. Hundreds of thousands of financial symbols from 100+ exchanges are at your fingertips. Unless you have incredibly niche interests, you’ll find what you’re looking for.

Never trade alone again
Unleash your creativity onto the world markets by being part of the largest social network for traders and investors. With thousands of ideas and minds published daily and ability to customize and share your analysis, start building your following today.

Always at your fingertips
Our secure and reliable cloud-based infrastructure means you’ll always have access to the world of finance, 24/7. No unexpected downtime at a critical trading moment ever again.

Eläke ja kuntoutus -sovellus on tarkoitettu Kevan asiakkaille. Sovellus korvaa aiemmin käytössä olleen Työeläkekortti-sovelluksen. 

Jos saat Kevasta eläkettä, voit seurata sovelluksessa maksuasioitasi, lukea uusimpia asiakirjoja ja vastaanottaa ajankohtaisia ilmoituksia omasta eläkkeestäsi.  

Sovellus sisältää myös sähköisen työeläkekortin, jonka saat käyttöösi, jos olet vanhuuseläkkeellä, työkyvyttömyyseläkkeellä tai työuraeläkkeellä. 

Jos olet ammatillisen kuntoutuksen asiakas, voit seurata maksuasioitasi ja lukea kuntoutukseen liittyvät asiakirjasi. Lisäksi saat kuntoutuksesta ilmoituksia, joten pysyt aina ajan tasalla omasta tilanteestasi. 

Myös eläkkeenhakijan kannattaa ladata sovellus, sillä voit tarkastella siinä asiakirjojasi. Kun sinusta on tullut eläkkeensaaja, näet sovelluksessa myös maksettavat eläkkeesi.  

Tunnistaudu sovellukseen henkilökohtaisilla verkkopankkitunnuksillasi, mobiilivarmenteella tai sirullisella henkilökortilla. Sen jälkeen voit luoda tunnusluvun, jolla tunnistaudut seuraavilla käyntikerroilla nopeasti ja helposti. 

Katso lisätietoa sovelluksesta Kevan verkkosivuilta https://www.keva.fi/elake-ja-kuntoutus-sovellus/

TaskuTurva – vakuutusturva aina mukanasi

TaskuTurva on vakuutusyhtiö Turvan mobiilisovellus, jossa vakuutusturva kulkee kätevästi aina mukanasi. Näet sekä omat että ammattiliittosi sinulle tarjoamat vakuutukset. TaskuTurvasta löydät vahingon sattuessa toimintaohjeet, lähimmän hoitolaitoksen tai autokorjaamon. Voit tarkistaa oman turvasi ja vakuutuslaskusi. Sovelluksen kautta olet meihin tietoturvallisesti yhteydessä, voit kysyä meiltä neuvoa ja hakea korvausta. TaskuTurvasta löydät myös vakuutuskorttisi - niiden avulla saat parhaan hyödyn vakuutuksistasi!

Ammattiliiton jäsenelle

Tutustu ammattiliittosi tarjoamaan vakuutusturvaan TaskuTurvassa. Jos liittosi on vakuuttanut sinut matkavakuutuksella, reissujasi turvaava matkavakuutuskortti löytyy myös TaskuTurvasta ja kulkee aina mukanasi. Hoitolaitoshaku näyttää reissun päällä luotettavan lääkärin yhteystiedot.

Apuna lääkärikäynnillä

Kun sinulla tai lapsellasi on Turvan terveysvakuutus, TaskuTurvan kautta löydät näppärästi hoitolaitoksen ja ilmoitat lääkäri- ja lääkekulut helposti. Kun omavastuu on maksettu, suorakorvaus on käytössäsi TaskuTurvassa koko loppuvuoden!

Turvaa tien päälle

Jos tien päällä sattuu ja tapahtuu, TaskuTurvasta löydät niin toimintaohjeet kuin lähimmän korjaamonkin. Voit olla yhteydessä hätäpalveluumme ja tarvittaessa järjestyy auton hinaus.

Eikun lataamaan

Ladatessasi TaskuTurvan tarvitset tunnistautumista varten verkkopankkitunnuksesi. Jatkossa sovellus toimii kätevästi valitsemallasi PIN-koodilla tai sormenjäljellä tai Face ID:lla.

Send Money Abroad – Fast, Safe & Affordable

Send money to your family and friends quickly and affordably with Taptap Send. Whether you’re supporting loved ones, covering school fees, or helping out in times of need, TapTap Send makes it easy to transfer money straight from your smartphone — no agent visits, no long waits.

With TapTap Send, you can transfer money across Africa, Asia, Latin America, and beyond in just a few taps. We offer low fees, excellent exchange rates, and multiple ways to receive money — including mobile wallets, bank transfers, and cash pickup. TapTap Send puts safety first. Our platform is PCI-compliant, encrypted, and designed with multiple levels of security to protect your personal and financial information. We never store your card details, and we never sell your personal data.

Anyfin – The repayments app

See if we can lower the interest on your installments, credit card debt, and personal loans. When you move them to us, you can always choose to pay off at a faster pace.

- Collect all your loans in one place and get an overview of your repayments.
- Set your own repayment plan.
- Make extra payments whenever it suits you.

Pay less interest, pay off more.
When less money goes to interest, more goes to paying off the debt itself. The faster you pay off, the cheaper the total cost of the loan becomes.

Keep track of your subscriptions.

Are you paying for things you don’t use? See all your subscriptions, recurring payments, and fixed costs in one place. Cancel unused subscriptions directly in the app with just a click or two. Maybe you’ll find money you can use to make extra payments on your loan instead.

See your UC credit score directly in the Anyfin app.
Together with UC, we’ve developed UC-Kollen, where you can check your credit score directly in our app. It’s completely free and does not affect your credit score.

Insure the monthly cost of your loan.
Anyfin’s Payment Protection Insurance can help you cover your essential monthly costs if you become sick or are involuntarily unemployed. You choose the monthly amount you want to insure (up to 10,000 SEK per month).

Important! Borrowing costs money.
If you cannot repay your debt on time, you risk getting a payment default. This can lead to difficulties in renting a home, signing contracts, and obtaining new loans. For support, contact budget and debt counseling in your municipality. Contact details can be found on konsumentverket.se.

Representative example

A refinancing loan of 45 000 SEK at 14,16% nominal interest rate with a repayment period of 60 months, with 60 installments of 1 051 SEK, results in a total effective interest rate of 15,12%. The total repayment amount will be 63 048 SEK.

The maximum amount that can be refinanced with Anyfin is 500 000 SEK. The loan term can be as short as 1 month and as long as 180 months, depending on the current term. The nominal interest rate can range from a minimum of 6,98 % to a maximum of 23,00 %. The effective interest rate can range from a minimum of 7,21 % to a maximum of 25,59 %.

developer: Bank Norwegian, en filial av NOBA Bank Group AB (publ)
description:
The app from Bank Norwegian makes it easy to keep track of your customer relationship and the app enables you to: 

-	Get an overview of your Bank Norwegian card, loan and savings account. 
-	See transactions and invoices. 
-	Pay bills or transfer money from your Norwegian card or savings account. 
-	Create and keep an overview of electronic invoices and direct debits on savings account. 
-	View CashPoints you have earned. 
-	Retrieve your PIN code.
-	Block and order a new card.
-	Apply on a higher credit limit.

The app is activated by using your BankID. You can choose to log in with a personal code or using fingerprints.
